title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Skills: Special Education Foundation Course: Multimedia Podcast Utilization Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can define 20 core special education terms and apply them to practical cases.
Learners can listen to podcasts on educational strategies for various disability types and propose three or more practical methods in a simulated environment.
Learners can utilize podcast content at least twice weekly and achieve an 80% or higher success rate in formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
